entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
